item.title: Using USB Pass-through in vSphere 4.1
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Finally USB pass-through is possible on ESX hosts with the new vSphere 4.1 release! This feature ha been available in VMware Workstation/Fusion and Player for quite a while. The freshly added feature in vSphere 4.1 even works if you vMotion the guest from one host to another, which is in itself pretty amazing functionality! In this post, I’ll show how to setup and use the new USB pass-through feature in vSphere 4.
